"widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"37.S.Shetty.layoutGrid1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid1 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"37.S.Shetty.layoutGrid1$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"37.S.Shetty.layoutGrid1$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-12","content":[{"$widgetId":"37.S.Shetty.layoutGrid2","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid2 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"37.S.Shetty.layoutGrid2$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"37.S.Shetty.layoutGrid2$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg-9 col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"37.S.Shetty.text1","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text1","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Mr. Dinesh Shetty"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h1"}},{"$widgetId":"37.S.Shetty.text2","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text2","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"General Counsel & Company Secretary"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}},{"$widgetId":"37.S.Shetty.text3","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text3","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Mr. Dinesh Shetty is the General Counsel & Company Secretary of Titan Company Limited. He heads the Legal & Secretarial functions of the Company.

He holds a Master's Degree in Commerce and LLB from Mumbai University and is a Fellow Member of the Institute of Company Secretaries of India.

He has over 25 years of experience in the field of Corporate & Securities Laws, Litigation, Arbitration, Corporate Finance, Mergers & Acquisitions, and Corporate Governance.

In his previous assignment with Mahindra Holidays & Resorts India Ltd., the Leisure & Hospitality Sector of the Mahindra Group, he worked as General Counsel & Company Secretary for over six years.

Prior to Mahindra Group, he worked with Schenectady Herdillia Limited (SI Group), Marsh India Insurance Brokers Private Limited (Marsh & McLennan Companies,) and Parle AgroPrivate Limited."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}},{"$widgetId":"37.S.Shetty.layoutGrid2$row0$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg-3 col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"37.S.Shetty.container1","widget":"Container","props":{"class":"mx-name-container1","renderMode":"div","onClick":null,"content":null,"ariaHidden":false}},{"$widgetId":"37.S.Shetty.staticImage1","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage1","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$Dinesh_Shetty.jpg?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}}]}}]}}]}}]}}]}}]}}],"listenTargets":[]
